sense.gloss: fellow traveler, fellow traveller, travelling companion
taking someone along unwillingly (e.g. in death), forcing to take part

sdata.j: ↑二↑↓に↓↑人↑↓にん↓の|↑道連↑↓みちづ↓れ|と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑出立↑↓しゅったつ↓した。
sdata.e: I started with two traveling companions.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑旅↑↓たび↓の|↑道連↑↓みちづ↓れ|だった。
sdata.e: They were companions on the journey.
Good company on the road is the shortest cut.

sdata.j: ↑旅↑↓たび↓は|↑道連↑↓みちづ↓れ|↑世↑↓よ↓は↑情↑↓なさ↓け。
sdata.e: No road is long with good company.

sdata.j: どうせ、↑妙子↑↓たえこ↓さんが↑怖↑↓こわ↓がって、↑有利↑↓ゆうり↓さんも|↑道連↑↓みちづ↓れ|にしようとしたんでしょ。
sdata.e: I'm sure Taeko was scared and tried to get Yuri to go along with her.

sdata.j: むやみに↑自殺↑↓じさつ↓を↑否定↑↓ひてい↓しようとは↑思↑↓おも↓いませんが、↑親↑↓おや↓が↑子↑↓こ↓どもを|↑道連↑↓みちづ↓れ|にするのはぜったいにやめてほしい、と↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I don't intend to flatly reject suicide, but I really wish parents would not make their children join in with them.
